ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.formulaCraft: Negative formula for crafting without proficiency
This a formula for apply a negative effect at the tool to do something without proficiency. e.g -2, or -1d4
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.rarityFlag.h: Color Items in the sidebar and the inventory that are items based on its rarity
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.spellFlag.hi: Color Items in the sidebar and the inventory that are Spells
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.featFlag.hin: Color Items in the sidebar and the inventory that are Features
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.enableBackgr: Enable Color only as background and not text
Color the Backgrounds Items in the sidebar and the inventory instead the text
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.reset.name: Reset settings to default
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.debug.name: Enable debugging
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.setting.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.dialogs.resetsetting: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
ts-corruzione-dnd5e.dialogs.nosystemfoun:
This system is not currently fully supported. This means that the module does not know how to best handle this system's items, but can still operate in a limited fashion.

You can configure the module's settings yourself, but it requires a bit of technical know-how.
This system was previously not supported, but in an recent update it was added as a supported system!

Do you want to load this system's default Item Pile settings?

ts-corruzione-dnd5e.dialogs.menu.hint: Set colors for item, spells and features

ts-corruzione-dnd5e.dialog.warning.areyo: Are you sure you want to add the object ?
The object (usually a gem) will be destroyed when the operation is completed, so be careful adventurer.
